item.title: Man convicted of trying to assassinate Trump tried to stab himself in the neck after guilty verdict was read
item.description: A man has been found guilty of trying to assassinate President Donald Trump last year at his Florida golf course.

item.title: Loophole doomed Bean Point’s no-swim ordinance, Anna Maria mayor says
item.description: Mayor Mark Short vetoed this ordinance at a Sept. 15 meeting.

item.title: Deputy-involved shooting reported in Punta Gorda
item.description: No deputies were shot and the medical condition of a suspect is unknown at this time.

item.title: Tropics heating up and so are we
item.description: We are monitoring 2 areas in the tropics, Invest 93L and 94L located in the south central Atlantic.
